body.p: Instead of reusing a series of consecutive elements (for example steps, list items) one by one you can reuse an entire range of sibling elements. For this to work, both the initial and the final elements need to have IDs defined on them.

example.title: Small example of content key reference with ranges
example.codeblock: <steps> <step id="washing"> <cmd>Wash the vegetables thoroughly.</cmd> </step> â€¦.. <step id="peeling"> <cmd>Pass the peeler gently over the vegetable.</cmd> </step> </steps>
